practice_phrases.target: I am trying to learn now
I am looking forward to learning with you

practice_phrases.known: 我今天早上想学习一些有用的东西
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to learn something useful this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我开始学习因为我想说
practice_phrases.target: I started to learn because I want to speak

practice_phrases.known: 我努力学习如何尽可能好地说
practice_phrases.target: I am trying to learn how to speak as well as I can

practice_phrases.known: 我想学习说英语因为我想和你说话
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to learn to speak English because I want to speak with you

practice_phrases.known: 我期待学习如何仔细地说因为我想说得很好
practice_phrases.target: I am looking forward to learning how to speak carefully because I want to speak very well
